results.question: What is the patient's age in years?
What is the patient's body mass index (BMI) in kilograms per square meter (kg/m2)?
Has the patient participated in a comprehensive weight-management program for at least 6 months?
Does the patient have a BMI greater than or equal to 30 kg per square meter?
Does the patient have a BMI ≥ 27 kg/m² AND at least one weight-related comorbid condition?
What is the diagnosis for the medication being requested?
Has the patient had a weight loss of more than or equal to 5% of baseline body weight?
